Title: Relates to the denial of certain insurance claims
Summary: Relates to the denial of certain insurance claims and requires municipal and government entities to notify mortgagees and lien holders when such entities are denied access to inspect certain real properties.
LawCode: Add ยง3407-b, Ins L; add ยง99-x, Gen Muni L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the insurance law, in relation to the denial of certain insurance claims; and to amend the general municipal law, in relation to requiring certain municipal and government entities to notify mortgagees and lien holders when such entities are denied access to inspect certain real properties
